languages.text: Веабос-6 — тихая гавань, где стоит печься о душе. Крепость покаяния с приставленным к ней орденом боевых флагеллянтов — место, где оступившийся может обрести покой и переродиться в крестоносца.

Vheabos VI is a quiet haven and a place to ponder the state of one's soul. A fortress of repentance complete with an order of battle flagellants will offer lawbreakers a chance to find solace in being reborn as a crusader.
languages.original_text: Веабос-6 — тихая гавань, где стоит печься о душе. Крепость покаяния с приставленным к ней орденом боевых флагеллянтов — место, где оступившийся может обрести покой и переродиться в крестоносца.

traits.locale_text: Vheabos VI is a quiet haven and a place to ponder the state of one's soul. A fortress of repentance complete with an order of battle flagellants will offer lawbreakers a chance to find solace in being reborn as a crusader.
Vheabos-VI — a quiet haven where one should mind the state of their soul. The fortress of repentance with its attached order of battle flagellants is a worthy use of the planet.

Vheabos VI is a quiet haven and a place to ponder the state of one's soul. A fortress of repentance complete with an order of battle flagellants will offer lawbreakers a chance to find solace in being reborn as a crusader.
Vheabos-VI — a quiet haven where one should mind the state of their soul. A fortress of repentance complete with an order of battle flagellants is a worthy use of the planet.

Vheabos VI is a quiet haven and a place to ponder the state of one's soul. A fortress of repentance complete with an order of battle flagellants will offer lawbreakers a chance to find solace in being reborn as a crusader.

Vheabos VI is a quiet haven and a place to ponder the state of one's soul. A fortress of repentance complete with an order of battle flagellants will offer lawbreakers a chance to find solace in being reborn as a crusader.

Vheabos VI is a quiet haven and a place to ponder the state of one's soul. A fortress of repentance complete with an order of battle flagellants will offer lawbreakers a chance to find solace in being reborn as a crusader.

languages.text: Vhéabos-VI est un véritable havre de paix, et même plus encore : un lieu de réflexion et d'introspection. Une forteresse de repentir dotée d'un ordre de flagellants guerriers offrirait aux criminels une chance de trouver du réconfort en renaissant en tant que croisés.
languages.original_text: Vheabos VI is a quiet haven and a place to ponder the state of one's soul. A fortress of repentance complete with an order of battle flagellants will offer lawbreakers a chance to find solace in being reborn as a crusader.

traits.locale_text: Vhéabos-VI est un véritable havre de paix, et même plus encore : un lieu de réflexion et d'introspection. Une forteresse de repentir dotée d'un ordre de flagellants guerriers offrirait aux criminels une chance de trouver du réconfort en renaissant en tant que croisés.

languages.text: ヴィアボス・VIは静かな避難所であり、自分の魂のあり方について熟考する場所である。リペンタンスのフォートレスには戦闘旗手団があり、法を犯した者は征戦士に生まれ変わることで慰めを得ることができる。
languages.original_text: Vheabos VI is a quiet haven and a place to ponder the state of one's soul. A fortress of repentance complete with an order of battle flagellants will offer lawbreakers a chance to find solace in being reborn as a crusader.

traits.locale_text: ヴィアボス・VIは静かな避難所であり、自分の魂のあり方について熟考する場所である。リペンタンスのフォートレスには戦闘旗手団があり、法を犯した者は征戦士に生まれ変わることで慰めを得ることができる。

languages.text: 维博斯六号星，这里是安静的避风港，人们可以在此专注反思自己的灵魂。这里拥有一支战斗苦行修会，可以让曾经的罪犯改过自新，重新找到灵魂的安宁。
languages.original_text: Vheabos VI is a quiet haven and a place to ponder the state of one's soul. A fortress of repentance complete with an order of battle flagellants will offer lawbreakers a chance to find solace in being reborn as a crusader.

traits.locale_text: 维博斯六号星，这里是安静的避风港，人们可以在此专注反思自己的灵魂。这里拥有一支战斗苦行修会，可以让曾经的罪犯改过自新，重新找到灵魂的安宁。

languages.text: Vheabos VI es un santuario silencioso, ideal para meditar sobre el estado de la propia alma. Una fortaleza de arrepentimiento, con su propia orden de flagelantes, ofrecería a los delincuentes la ocasión de renacer como cruzados y expiar sus errores.
languages.original_text: Vheabos VI is a quiet haven and a place to ponder the state of one's soul. A fortress of repentance complete with an order of battle flagellants will offer lawbreakers a chance to find solace in being reborn as a crusader.

traits.locale_text: Vheabos VI es un santuario silencioso, ideal para meditar sobre el estado de la propia alma. Una fortaleza de arrepentimiento, con su propia orden de flagelantes, ofrecería a los delincuentes la ocasión de renacer como cruzados y expiar sus errores.

languages.text: Vheabos-VI ist ein sicherer Hafen und ein ruhiger Ort, um über die eigene Seele nachzusinnen. Eine Festung der Buße einschließlich eines Ordens von Kampfflagellanten bietet Gesetzesbrechern die Gelegenheit, Trost in der Wiedergeburt als Kreuzritter zu finden.
languages.original_text: Vheabos VI is a quiet haven and a place to ponder the state of one's soul. A fortress of repentance complete with an order of battle flagellants will offer lawbreakers a chance to find solace in being reborn as a crusader.

traits.locale_text: Vheabos-VI ist ein sicherer Hafen und ein ruhiger Ort, um über die eigene Seele nachzusinnen. Eine Festung der Buße einschließlich eines Ordens von Kampfflagellanten bietet Gesetzesbrechern die Gelegenheit, Trost in der Wiedergeburt als Kreuzritter zu finden.

languages.text: Vheabos VI, sessiz ve sakin oluşuyla kişiye ruh hâlini düşünme fırsatı verir. Tövbekârlar, kendileri için inşa edilecek olan bir kalenin yanı sıra bir dizi harp kırbaççısı ile mücahit olarak yeni bir hayata kavuşma fırsatı bulacaktır.
languages.original_text: Vheabos VI is a quiet haven and a place to ponder the state of one's soul. A fortress of repentance complete with an order of battle flagellants will offer lawbreakers a chance to find solace in being reborn as a crusader.
